message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but you get a little something to get us started.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%. It's still a good deal, and we can both get something before the inflation hits harder.
I'm willing to take a little less than half. Let's make this work before we both lose money to inflation.
